comment.p: Nebula emulates Capcom CPS-1, CPS-2 and Neo-Geo games.

revision.comment: Updated supplements for MAME v0.66.
Updated for Nebula v2.23 (added 1944 and renamed armware to armwar).
Updated supplements for MAME v0.65. Also renamed armwar to armware (until ElSemi names it properly again).
Updated for v2.22a (kof2001, mmatrix and mmatrixj added).
Updated supplements for MAME v0.64.
Updated supplements for MAME v0.63.

Updated for Nebula v2.21a.
Added dimahoo and gmahou, changed batcira->batcir.

Updated for Nebula v2.21 (Universe BIOS added).
Also updated supplements for MAME v0.62.
Minor fix for merging of Zupapa.
Released data files for Nebula v2.20.
Released data files for Nebula v2.19d.
Released data files for Nebula v2.15a.
Released data files for Nebula v2.15.
Released data files for Nebula v2.14b.
Released data files for Nebula v2.13.
Released data files for Nebula v2.12 (lots of ROM changes and Oriental Legend added).
Released data files for Nebula v2.11.

Minor improvement so the data files match the drivers exactly (used a new DatUtil feature).
There is now no doubt that the data file generated by Nebula contains many errors so use mine instead!
Updated for supplementary dats for MAME v0.59.
Updated for Nebula v2.1.
Added MAME Supplementary dats.
Updated for Nebula v2.0a.
Updated for Nebula v2.0.
Updated for Nebula v1.97.

Updated for Nebula v1.96.
Also went through all ROM names reconciling them against those in the RomCenter data file that Nebula generates.
Updated for Nebula v1.95c (Garou related changes).
Updated for Nebula v1.95a (Neo-Geo changes and additions).
Updated for Nebula v1.94b (decrypted games added plus a few other changes).
Updated for Nebula v1.94 (KOF2000 added and a couple of 'newer' games removed).
Updated for Nebula v1.93 (loads of Neo-Geo changes and additions).
Changed the p1 ROM in kof99.

Updated for Nebula v1.92.
Added playable games armwar, mshvsf, mshvsfj, mshvsfj1 and vsav.
Added 'dummy parents' ddtod and xmvsf.
Updated for Nebula v1.91b.
Added XORs for dstlk, dstlkr1, ddsom, sfa and sfar1.
Updated for Nebula v1.9 (renamed pbobble to pbobblen).
Added 137 Neo-Geo games. No need to include CPS-2 .drv files anymore as Nebula supplies them as standard.
Added batcirj, ecofghtr, sfa3, sfa3r1, sfz3j and vampjr1 for Nebula v1.7. Renamed some ROMs in xmcota.
Added smbomb, smbombr1, mshj and did some renaming.
Added nine SF2 clones and Three Wonders (US) for Nebula v1.6a.
Added about 60 CPS-1 games for Nebula v1.6.
Added Capcom Sports Club and SSF2 Tournament Battle.
Updated for Nebula v1.5.
Added XORs for Armored Warriors.
Added Street Fighter Zero 2.
Added X-Men rental version.
Added Super Street Fighter 2 X and Street Fighter Zero 3.
Added Super Puzzle Fighter 2 X and made some ROM renames.
Added D&D: Shadow over Mystara (US).
Added D&D: Tower of Doom (Japan).
Added Powered Gear (Japan).
Added Marvel Super Heroes (Hispanic).
Added 19XX (Hispanic).
Uploaded dats for Nebula v1.2.
Uploaded dats to support all possible CPS-2 games.
Uploaded dats for Nebula v1.0a.
Uploaded preliminary dats for Nebula.
